data.title: concepCy
data.slogan: A multilingual knowledge graph in spaCy
data.description: A spaCy wrapper for ConceptNet, a freely-available semantic network designed to help computers understand the meaning of words.
code_example: doc = nlp('WHO is a lovely company')
